<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file contains the mechanics for machine function pass registries.  A</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function pass registry (MachinePassRegistry) is auto filled by the static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constructors of MachinePassRegistryNode.  Further there is a command line</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// parser (RegisterPassParser) which listens to each registry for additions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and deletions, so that the appropriate command option is updated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepassregistry/#ae8d39b722a94eb48e48861c993b7e33e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepassregistry/#ae8d39b722a94eb48e48861c993b7e33e">setDefault</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    PassCtorTy Ctor = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepassregistrynode">MachinePassRegistryNode&lt;PassCtorTy&gt;</a> &#42;R = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepassregistry/#ac8d7991bdabf5560460758cadbe23572">getList</a>(); R;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">         R = R-&gt;getNext()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">        Ctor = R-&gt;getCtor();</Highlight></CodeLine>
